metadata.title: CVE-2021-45343 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In LibreCAD 2.2.0, a NULL pointer dereference in the HATCH handling oflibdxfrw allows an attacker to crash the application using a crafted DXFdocument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45343` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.0.9-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
librecad-data - 2.0.9-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: librecad package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.9-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
